the facts <\s>. My account of them, therefore, is the 
following:- The fibres coming down from the 
<s>frontal <\s> convolutions in the superior half of the anterior two-thirds of 
the human brain are generally supposed to 
run into & to constitute the <s>a<\s> inner & outer 
capsules of the same side while a separate 
set of fibres is supposed to enter the corpus 
callosum, <s>and <\s> to cross <s> to the opposite side,<\s> &
to terminate in corresponding <s>[text?] convolutions 
of the opposite side. The corpus callosum is thus 
held to be a huge commissure between 
corresponding convolutions in the upper half of 
the cerebral hemispheres. Now all this I feel
